requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce Nvidia GTX 1050 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Processor: 1.4 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000

requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Big Sur 11.4
